resources.string: Interview - Kit is the most useful application, which is used to guide the students for their career and shares the knowledge for cracking interviews.\n It includes materials, interview questions(I.Q's), resumes for both fresher and experienced, quiz and updates on latest jobs e.t.c.. on respective technologies.

FRATELLO INNOTECH is fastest growing software development and training company in computer world. Our goal is to provide world class services and always be a customer centric. Our vision is to positive change in the world by imbibing the technology in every aspect of business. We provide world class Trainings. We do the designing, development, Testing of Projects. We make the best mobile applications in android. We undertake the college academic projects for B Tech, M Tech, MCA, BCA. We provide consulting Services too.
